name: py-transformers

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependencies.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-regex
dependencies.description: Alternative regular expression module, to replace re.

dependencies.name: py-sentencepiece
dependencies.description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
These are the Python bindings.
